definition: to be situated at/to find oneself at
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)

sentences.english: Today, however, the moon will embrace Uranus, the wild-card planet of the zodiac, in your third house of communication.
sentences.chinese: 然而今天，月亮和天王星處在你的第三宮交流宮。

sentences.english: Therefore, he is always in a state of being half crazy and half sober-minded.
sentences.chinese: 所以，他總是處在半醉半醒的狀態。

sentences.english: Parents should also acknowledge the frightening parts of the disaster when talking with a child about it.
sentences.chinese: 與孩子談話時，家長應清楚災難的可怕之處在哪裏。

sentences.english: The crust of east China has been affected by extensional stress since the Mesozoic-Ceno-zoic.
sentences.chinese: 新生代以來，中國東部地殼一直處在引張應力作用下。

sentences.english: Some artists living in China are at the doorsill to this segment.
sentences.chinese: 一些生活在中國的藝術家處在這個階段的門檻上。

sentences.english: All other metals and nonmetals lie within the boundaries of lead and diamond.
sentences.chinese: 所有其他金屬和非金屬都處在鉛和金剛石的界限之內。

sentences.english: China meet a pivotal time now. It's a new jumping-off point of history.
sentences.chinese: 現在中國正處在這樣一個關鍵時刻，歷史的新起點。

sentences.english: For water intake pump house pressure water test shall be made on the bedrock so as to define its permeability.
sentences.chinese: 取水泵房處在基岩中進行壓水試驗，以確定其透水性。

sentences.english: I think you looked as if you were half-asleep throughout the song.
sentences.chinese: 你唱歌的時候，看起來處在半睡眠狀態。

sentences.english: With Mars in Leo, you'll go after your goal with earnest.
sentences.chinese: 隨着處在獅子宮的火星，你肯定能完成你的目標。

sentences.english: We are living in a great historic era.
sentences.chinese: 我們正處在一個偉大的歷史時代。

sentences.english: It's now expecting fiscal-year results at the lower end of expectations.
sentences.chinese: 目前預計本財年公司收益將處在預測區間的低端。

sentences.english: Are we in the post-PC era?
sentences.chinese: 我們是否正處在後PC時代？

sentences.english: We are at such a juncture.
sentences.chinese: 我們正處在這樣一個關頭。

sentences.english: M. Fauchelevent almost occupied a place among these vanished beings.
sentences.chinese: 割風先生幾乎也處在這些消失的人中。

sentences.english: At present, China is in the transformation period of new and old systems.
sentences.chinese: 當前，我國處在新舊體制的轉型期。
